newsitem.title: USA: Alydaar delays release of Assessor 2000.
newsitem.headline: Alydaar delays release of Assessor 2000.

text.p: Alydaar Software Corp said Wednesday that it will delay the release of new software designed to help companies prepare for the Year 2000 because of new developments in a possible business alliance.
The company had planned to release the Assessor 2000 and its Compliance 2000 Impact Assessment Methodology Plan September 26.

"Recent developments in negotiations to form a significant new business alliance have required Alydaar Software to reconsider its decision to offer the assessment software at this time," said company Chairman Robert Gruder.
